When

by Francesco Garosi
franz.g@no-spam-please.infinito.it

A simple Desktop Task Scheduler

About When

When is a small applet designed with Ubuntu in mind that sits in the top panel and allows the user to run unattended tasks in the background, when certain conditions are met. Conditions are not limited to time and intervals, but also include checking results provided by other commands, session idle time and applet (session) startup and shutdown.

Features

  • User Interface for Tasks and Conditions
  • Task History with Results
  • Notifications
  • Pause and Resume Scheduler
  • Retain Configuration across Sessions

For more information, please refer to the Documentation.
